description: Backlog scenario - High volume testing with many open tickets

tickets.title: Cannot login to account
tickets.description: Getting 'Invalid credentials' error even with correct password

tickets.title: Feature request: Dark mode
tickets.description: Please add dark mode option for better night viewing

tickets.title: Payment failed but amount deducted
tickets.description: Transaction shows failed but money was taken from my account

tickets.title: How to export my data?
tickets.description: Need to export all my records as CSV for tax purposes

tickets.title: App crashes on iOS 17
tickets.description: App force closes immediately after opening on iPhone with iOS 17.2

tickets.title: Request for API access
tickets.description: We need API access for integration with our internal systems

tickets.title: Slow page load times
tickets.description: Dashboard takes over 10 seconds to load, affecting productivity

tickets.title: Email notifications not working
tickets.description: Not receiving any email notifications for ticket updates
tickets.resolution: Fixed email configuration issue on server. Notifications should now work correctly.

tickets.title: Add keyboard shortcuts
tickets.description: Would love keyboard shortcuts for common actions like 'n' for new ticket

tickets.title: Security concern: Password reset
tickets.description: Password reset link does not expire, potential security issue

tickets.title: Mobile app sync issues
tickets.description: Changes made on mobile don't sync to web version

tickets.title: Bulk import feature
tickets.description: Need ability to bulk import records from Excel

comments.author: agent1@support.com
comments.content: I've escalated this to our payment team. They are investigating the discrepancy.

comments.author: agent1@support.com
comments.content: Payment gateway logs show transaction was reversed. Need to check bank sync.

comments.author: agent2@support.com
comments.content: Can you please provide your device model and exact iOS version?

comments.author: agent1@support.com
comments.content: Issue was with our SMTP configuration. Fixed and verified.

comments.author: agent1@support.com
comments.content: Confirmed security issue. Need to implement token expiration ASAP.
